name: The Random Game
description:
Do you ever have to decide who does what? Like who has to take out the trash/make coffee/pay for drinks/start the board game. 

The Random Game will help you achieve this by randomly assigning a winner. This will be done via a marble race, where each player will be assigned a marble. The marbles will race each other and after a certain time period, the game will end and the leading marble will be the winner. 

Watch as the marbles race through the track, avoiding obstacles along the way (or not!).
